SEARCH
Package adris.altoclef.util.helpers

Interface WorldHelper

public interface WorldHelper
Super useful helper functions for getting information about the world.

    • isSolidBlock

      static boolean isSolidBlock(net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos pos)
      WARNING: this method checks if the block at the given position is a SOLID BLOCK things like ice, dirtPaths, soulSand... don't count into this if you just want to check if a block is solid use `BlockState.isSolid()` (which includes more variety of blocks including the mentioned ones, signs, pressure plates...) better method for blocks that can be walked on should be created instead
